DOC.brief_title: Subject Information Consent Form F1J-US-HMCB Duloxetine Once-Daily Dosing Versus Placebo Patients With Major Depression Pain
DOC.criteria: You must suffer symptom depression least past 2 week ( sadness , loss interest daily activity , feeling hopelessness guilt , sleeplessness lack energy ) You must pain symptom know cause , unexplainable , head , chest , back pain , overall ache pain , unexplainable pain . You need available visit doctor 's office week 10 week . You woman pregnant breastfeeding . You current previous diagnosis bipolar disorder , schizophrenia , psychotic disorder . You primary diagnosis anxiety disorder within past 6 month . You history alcohol drug dependence abuse within past 6 month . You serious medical illness .
